sentences.english: Loves had arrived place, was keeping yesterday's fragrance according to the past.
sentences.chinese: 爱曾经来到过的地方，依昔留着昨天的芬芳。

sentences.english: It is the emblematic red grape of Argentinean. Pleasant aroma to raspberries, cherries and plums with intense purple color.
sentences.chinese: 果香怡人，树莓，樱桃和李子的芬芳浓郁，呈酱紫色。

sentences.english: Campuss of autumn of blossoming flowers, the scent of airtime, charming.
sentences.chinese: 秋天的校园鲜花朵朵，争奇斗艳，芬芳迷人。

sentences.english: Its fragrant scent will give you unlimited imagination.
sentences.chinese: 她将赋予您馥郁的芬芳令人悠然上神往。

sentences.english: She fills my heart with very special things.
sentences.chinese: 她以特殊的芬芳弥漫了我的心间。

sentences.english: Admire everyone's beauty freely, and drink in the perfume of Spirit that is all around you.
sentences.chinese: 自在的欣赏每一个人的美，饮下环绕著你的灵性芬芳。

sentences.english: With trees and flowers everywhere, living conditions can be improved.
sentences.chinese: 到处师母环绕鲜花芬芳，生活条件就得到极大的改善。

sentences.english: 'A friend will add beauty to your life, Like a sweet scented flower.
sentences.chinese: 朋友就像芬芳怡人的鲜花，总会为你的生活增添光彩。
她喜欢气味芬芳的鲜花。

sentences.english: Flowers and green grass cover the ground.
sentences.chinese: 地上铺满了芬芳的花朵和绿草。

sentences.english: With their breath comes the memory of my old day songs.
sentences.chinese: 花气芬芳勾起我对往日歌曲的记忆。

sentences.english: It wins over by its absolutely amazing, very compact aroma of matured black currants.
sentences.chinese: 绝对迷人简洁的成熟红加仑芬芳令它得享盛誉。

sentences.english: The air was filled with the sweetness of mimosa.
sentences.chinese: 空气中弥漫着含羞草的芬芳。

sentences.english: Let us smell the fragrance of Tuberose reveal?
sentences.chinese: 让我们嗅到了夜来香吐露的芬芳？

sentences.english: 38Father Conmee perceived her perfume in the car.
sentences.chinese: 38康米神父觉察出车厢里散发着她那香水的芬芳。

sentences.english: Background Tea which flavor is fragrant is consumed only second to water .
sentences.chinese: 茶叶气味芬芳，是世界上仅次于水的第二大饮料。

definition: to penetrate deeply into the heart (idiom)/to gladden the heart/to refresh the mind
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
style of folk song popular in Gansu, Qinghai and Ningxia/CL:首[shou3]
flourishing blossom/a mass of flowers/luxuriant flowers
